issue.title: [Python] Building with Parquet but without Parquet encryption fails
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15847](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15847). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Locally (with Parquet enabled, but no Parquet encryption, both on C++ and Python level), I get:

```Java

CMake Error at CMakeLists.txt:643 (target_link_libraries):
  Cannot specify link libraries for target "_parquet_encryption" which is not
  built by this project.


-- Configuring incomplete, errors occurred!
```

(also after cleaning up old build files)

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15847?focusedCommentId=17502926) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 12565
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12565>
